key.name: orientation-lock
key.description: Locks orientation to a specific value.

key.name: color-temp
key.description: Sets the color temperature of your screen. The lower the value, the higher the intensity of the redness effect applied to the display.

key.name: color-temp-profile
key.description: The current color temperature profile being used by the indicator.

key.name: brightness
key.description: Stores the current brightness value of your screen.

key.name: light-theme
key.summary: The name of the light theme
key.description: This is the theme the indicator will set when "Light" is selected.

key.name: dark-theme
key.summary: The name of the dark theme
key.description: This is the theme the indicator will set when "Dark" is selected.

key.name: theme-profile
key.description: The current theme temperature profile being used by the indicator.
